prompt: Is there an API for audio transcription to text?

hidden_queries: API for audio transcription to text
audio to text transcription APIs what options exist

sources.title: Speech to text - OpenAI API
sources.snippet: The transcriptions API takes as input the audio file you want to transcribe and the desired output file format for the transcription of the audio. All models support the same set of input formats. On output: whisper-1 supports json, text, srt, verbose_json, and vtt. gpt-4o-transcribe and gpt-4o-mini-transcribe support json or plain text. gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize supports json, text, and ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — there are several APIs that transcribe audio into text you can integrate into apps or workflows. Most are REST-based and return text from speech automatically. Popular Transcription APIs OpenAI Transcriptions API — upload audio and get text (supports models like gpt-4o-transcribe & Whisper formats). OpenAI Platform
Google Cloud Speech-to-Text API — real-time and batch transcription with noise robustness and model tuning. Google Cloud
Microsoft Azure Speech-to-Text — REST API for fast and batch transcriptions, real-time too. Microsoft Learn

sources.title: Best Audio-to-Text APIs in 2025 – Transgate vs Google, AWS
sources.snippet: Best Audio-to-Text APIs in 2025: Compare Transgate, Google, AWS, and AssemblyAI Audio transcription is no longer a luxury—it’s a necessity. Whether you're building an app, automating content production, or running interviews, choosing the best audio-to-text API can define your productivity and cost-efficiency.

citation_mappings.claim_text: AWS Transcribe — Amazon’s speech-to-text API (batch and streaming) within AWS ecosystem. Transgate
Rev.ai API — transcription and real-time speech-to-text with focus on compliance/security. Rev AI
Whisper-based APIs (e.g., Whisper API) — third-party wrappers around OpenAI’s Whisper model. whisper-api.com

sources.title: Best Audio-to-Text APIs in 2025 – Transgate vs Google, AWS
sources.snippet: Best Audio-to-Text APIs in 2025: Compare Transgate, Google, AWS, and AssemblyAI Audio transcription is no longer a luxury—it’s a necessity. citation_mappings.claim_text: Other providers (Deepgram, AssemblyAI, Transkriptor, Gladia, etc.) offer APIs with features like diarization, timestamps, sentiment, and more. Transgate+1
What these APIs do Accept audio files or real-time audio streams. Google Cloud

Support multiple languages and features to handle noise, domain vocabularies, etc. Transgate
